Class StoreDirectAbstract

  • org.mapdb.StoreDirectAbstract
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConcurrencyAware, Store, StoreImmutable, Verifiable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StoreDirect, StoreWAL

    public class StoreDirectAbstract
implements Store

    Common utils for StoreDirect, StoreWAL and StoreCached
